section.title: Prepare for Input Model Changes
section.para: The previous steps created a modified &productname; tarball with the NSX-v core plugin in the &o_netw; and neutronclient venvs. The tar file can now be extracted and the ardana-init.bash script can be run to set up the deployment files and directories. If a modified tar file was not created, then extract the tar from the /media/cdrom/ardana location.
